DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to explore if chlorogenic acid is safe in patients with cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Trial of Chlorogenic Acid in Patients With Advanced Cancer
DOC.criteria: advanced cancer with no effective treatment Karnofsky performance status no less than 70 adequated organ function informed consent allergic to chlorogenic acid persistent toxicities from previous treatment (no less than grade 2)
